TFComboBox

class ui.tf_widgets.tf_combo_box.TFComboBox(parent=None, case_sensitive=False, reset_on_focus_out=True, font_family='Montserrat', font_size=12)[source]

Bases: QComboBox

A custom combo box with dynamic filtering and item management capabilities.

This combo box extends QComboBox to provide real-time filtering of items as the user types, with options for case sensitivity and focus behavior.

Parameters:

  • parent (QWidget, optional) – Parent widget. Defaults to None.

  • case_sensitive (bool, optional) – Whether filtering is case sensitive. Defaults to False.

  • reset_on_focus_out (bool, optional) – Reset to full list when focus lost. Defaults to True.

  • font_family (str, optional) – Font family to use. Defaults to “Montserrat”.

  • font_size (int, optional) – Font size to use. Defaults to 12.

Example

>>> # Create a filtered combo box
>>> combo = TFComboBox(
...     parent=widget,
...     case_sensitive=True,
...     font_size=14
... )
>>> combo.setup_items(['Apple', 'Banana', 'Cherry'])
>>> combo.add_item('Date')
__init__(parent=None, case_sensitive=False, reset_on_focus_out=True, font_family='Montserrat', font_size=12)[source]
setup_items(items)[source]

Set up the initial list of items.

Parameters:

items (list) – List of items to populate the combo box.

focusOutEvent(e)[source]

Handle focus loss event.

Resets items to full list if reset_on_focus_out is True and current text isn’t in the items list.

Parameters:

e – Focus event object.

get_all_items()[source]

Get a copy of all items in the combo box.

Returns:

Copy of all items, including filtered ones.

Return type:

list

add_item(item)[source]

Add a new item to the combo box.

Only adds the item if it’s not already in the list.

Parameters:

item (str) – Item to add.

remove_item(item)[source]

Remove an item from the combo box.

Removes the item from both the visible list and internal storage.

Parameters:

item (str) – Item to remove.
